title: Client
text:
{{wiktionary|client}}
'''Client'''('''s''') or '''The Client''' may refer to:

* [[Client (business)]]
* [[Client (computing)]], hardware or software that accesses a remote service on another computer
* [[Customer]] or client, a recipient of goods or services in return for monetary or other valuable considerations
* [[Client (ancient Rome)]], an individual protected and sponsored by a patron
* [[Client (band)]], a British synthpop band
** [[Client (album)|''Client'' (album)]], a 2003 album by Client
* [[Clients (album)|''Clients'' (album)]], a 2005 album by The Red Chord
* [[The Client (novel)|''The Client'' (novel)]], a 1993 legal thriller by John Grisham
** [[The Client (1994 film)|''The Client'' (1994 film)]], a film adaptation
** [[The Client (TV series)|''The Client'' (TV series)]], a 1995–1996 television series adaptation
* [[The Client (Star Wars)|The Client (''Star Wars'')]], a character in ''The Mandalorian''
* [[The Client (2011 film)|''The Client'' (2011 film)]], a South Korean courtroom thriller
* [[The Client (The Office)|"The Client" (''The Office'')]], an episode of ''The Office''

== See also ==
* [[Client (prostitution)]]
* [[Client state]], which is economically, politically, or militarily subordinate to another more powerful state
* {{Intitle|Client}}

{{disambiguation}}
